markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 628 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Alchemical items are powered by reactions of alchemical reagents. Alchemical items aren’t magical and don’t radiate a magical aura.
name: Alchemical
